summary: The Saint returns to London and with the help of an American pickpocket and a beautiful adventuress breaks a counterfeiting ring.
cast: George Sanders|Sally Gray|David Burns|Gordon McLeod|Henry Oscar|Athene Seyler|John Abbott|Ralph Truman|Charles Carson|Carl Jaffe|Norah Howard|Ballard Berkeley|Charles Paton|Jack Mandeville|Hugh McDermott|Charles Oliver|Ben Williams|Ian Wilson
keywords: shot in the back|man hits a woman|man punches a woman|man wears a tuxedo|ex convict
title: The Saint in London
